title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6400.0 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6400.0 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to set forth the methods and
procedures governing the availability of records of the New York State Council
on the Arts subject to the provisions of article 6 of the Public Officers Law, known as the Freedom of Information Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6400.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
